mapper.select:
SELECT a.vid, a.title, a.create_ymd as createYmd, a.grade, a.sort , a.channel_id as channelId, b.title as channelTitle, a.thumbnail_d as thumbnailDefault , a.thumbnail_m as thumbnailMedium, a.thumbnail_h as thumbnailHigh, a.publishedAt, a.shorts, a.qSignal , a.regid as userId, a.upddt as updDt, a.main_yn as mainYn FROM tb_youtube_faith a inner join tb_origin_vid b on a.channel_id = b.channel_id where 1=1 and a.del_yn = 'N'
AND a.channel_id = #{channelId}
AND a.title like concat('%', nullif(#{keyword}, ''), '%')
AND a.vid like concat('%', nullif(#{keyword}, ''), '%')
AND a.qSignal like concat('%', nullif(#{qSignal}, ''), '%')
AND a.shorts = #{shorts}
order by a.upddt desc
LIMIT 50
mapper.update: update tb_youtube_faith set del_yn = 'Y', updid=#{userId}, upddt=current_timestamp() WHERE vid=#{vid}
